title: Holy Ghost, With Light Divine
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: Shine upon this heart of mine;
Chase the shade of night away;
v2: Let me see my Savior's face,
Let me all His beauties trace;
Show those glorious truths to me
Which are only known to Thee.
v3: Cleanse this guilty heart of mine;
v4: Cheer this saddened heart of mine;
v5: Dwell within this heart of mine;
v6: See, to Thee I yield my heart,
Shed Thy life through every part;
A pure temple I would be,
